name: iOS 14.2 and iPadOS 14.2
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie and XingWei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A user may answer two calls simultaneously without indication they have answered a second call
advisories.description: An issue existed in the handling of incoming calls. The issue was addressed with additional state checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Francis working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch 7th generation, iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Anonymous working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, JunDong Xie and Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab
Anonymous working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, JunDong Xie and Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted PDF may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: S.Y. of ZecOps Mobile XDR, an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch 7th generation, iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: An issue existed within the path validation logic for symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved path sanitization.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of reports that an exploit for this issue exists in the wild.
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch 7th generation, iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch 7th generation, iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with system privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to disclose kernel memory. Apple is aware of reports that an exploit for this issue exists in the wild.
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine kernel memory layout
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Apple is aware of reports that an exploit for this issue exists in the wild.
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to access stored passwords without authentication
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch 7th generation, iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed through improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch 7th generation, iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPod touch (7th generation), iPad Air 2 and later, and iPad mini 4 and later
advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed with improved logic.
